C

categories(int) - Static method in class controllers.CategoryController
Method categories finds all entries in database in table Main_Category and collects them and sends them to the view which will represent them correctly Renders the folowing parameters : productsList - which are all the products which are not sold and not special (not distinguished products) and are from the main Category by the id received; specialProductList - all the products that are not sold and are made special (are distinguished products) and are from the main Category by the id received; mainCategoryList - the list of our categories; mc - the main category clicked on, which we have found by the id received as the parameters;
CategoryController - Class in controllers
Class CategoryController is out controller through which we control all the actions and function concerning the Categories of our products
CategoryController() - Constructor for class controllers.CategoryController

checkPassword(String, String) - Static method in class helpers.HashHelper
Method to check if entered user password is the same as the one that is stored (encrypted) in the database.
chooseRegistration() - Static method in class controllers.Application
Method chooseRegistration() renders the chooseRegistration.html page; Where the user will choose to register as a regular User or a pikShop;

credit - Variable in class models.Product
 
CreditController - Class in controllers
This controller is User to control the Users Credit their amount, to get certain amount that User has, to Use them when a User wants to use them on a a certain product to get their product to be special(listed among the first ones) in search queries, to subtract them when used on certain products; Basically everything and every actions one with the Credits (which are simple integers), is done with this class CreditControllers;
CreditController() - Constructor for class controllers.CreditController
 
creditForm - Static variable in class controllers.CreditController
